translations: 狂饮；吸入可卡因；吹奏出；使发出嘟嘟声（toot 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: So if you find yourself "tooting" after eating dairy, you're not alone.
sentences.translation: 因此，如果你发现你自己吃完乳制品后肚子咕噜咕噜的，这是很正常的。

sentences.sentence: But tooting your own horn too much - and too obviously - can hurt your professional image.
sentences.translation: 但是牛皮吹得太大太明显的话，反而会损害到你的职业形象。

sentences.sentence: If you don't mind my tooting own horn, I just got that important promotion I was hoping for.
sentences.translation: 希望你别介意我自夸一下，我刚得到一个期待已久的重要晋升机会。
